articles.description: Booking a holiday can be stressful and it's hard to know when prices will rise. A holiday home company has shared its advice for key dates to book a summer or Easter holiday.
articles.content:
If Britons want to get away to celebrate the extra time off, they should try to book before March 23.
When it comes to summer holidays, Britons should book their break in the sun by May 30 to truly … [+291 chars]
